member.name: IFileViewerSite.GetPinnedWindow
member.summary: Gets the handle to the current pinned window, if one exists.
member.param: A pointer to the handle of the current pinned window or NULL if no pinned window exists.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileViewerSite.SetPinnedWindow
member.summary: Sets the pinned window. When the user selects a new file to view, the Shell directs the file viewer to display the new file in the pinned window instead of creating a new window.
member.param: A handle to the new pinned window or NULL if there is to be no pinned window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileViewerSite
member.summary: Exposes methods that designate an interface that allows a file viewer to retrieve the handle to the current pinned window, or to set a new pinned window. The pinned window is the window in which the current file viewer displays a file. When the user selects a new file to view, the Shell directs the file viewer to display the new file in the pinned window rather than create a new window.
